LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasPrevented: A short circuit was prevented. All overcurrent that occurred was absorbed by the internal mechanism of {0}. Thankfully, there's no noticeable damage.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitRainWasPrevented: A circuit was exposed to rain and nearly shorted; however, since the overcurrent was interrupted by the advanced control mechanism of {0}, it was not damaged.
LanguageData.SCPEffectReductionBatteryPowerLossOnLeak: [{0} effect]\n {1}% reduction of battery loss on leakage.
LanguageData.SCPEffectAbsorptionAllLeakedEnergy: [{0} effect]\n All the released energy of {1} Wd was absorbed.
LanguageData.MustPlaceWithWaterSourceAndFreeSpace: Both water source and work space necessary.
LanguageData.DrawWaterwayFailedNonWaterSource: {0} tried to draw something other than a water source into the waterway. But a foolish attempt ended in failure.
LanguageData.SoilWasSaltDamagedByDeepwater: The surrounding soil was salt damaged by seawater that has been drawn in.
LanguageData.NeedHeavyAnd1OverFertility: The ground must be able to support heavy objects with a fertility of 100% or more.
LanguageData.WatchingEclipseAtHotSpring: watching eclipse while relaxing in hot spring.
LanguageData.WatchingAuroraAtHotSpring: watching aurora while relaxing in hot spring.
LanguageData.StargazingAtHotSpring: gazing stars while relaxing in hot spring.
LanguageData.CloudWatchingAtHotSpring: watching clouds while relaxing in hot spring.
LanguageData.WatchingSunriseAtHotSpring: watching sunrise while relaxing in hot spring.
LanguageData.WatchingSunsetAtHotSpring: watching sunset while relaxing in hot spring.
LanguageData.WatchingEclipseAtSpring: watching eclipse while refleshing in spring.
LanguageData.WatchingAuroraAtSpring: watching aurora while refleshing in spring.
LanguageData.StargazingAtSpring: gazing stars while refleshing in spring.
LanguageData.CloudWatchingAtSpring: watching clouds while refleshing in spring.
LanguageData.WatchingSunriseAtSpring: watching sunrise while refleshing in spring.
LanguageData.WatchingSunsetAtSpring: watching sunset while refleshing in spring.
LanguageData.txt_Skill_FirstAid_Desc:
[First aid]
Provide emergency treatment, such as hemostasis, to subjects in need of treatment. No medication or bedding required, but next treatment must wait for cool down.

Quality：{0}
Cooldown：{1}sec.
LanguageData.txt_Skill_AdrenalineBurst_Desc:
[Adrenaline burst]
Approximately 80 seconds, dramatically improve their metabolism and strengthen physical ability. Can be deactivated at any time after activation. When the effect exceeds 80%, overheating occurs, and when it reaches 100%, the skill is forcibly deactivated. Also gain 100% resistance to stuns while active. 

Cooldown: {0} sec.
LanguageData.MSG_FoxianHealingSucceeded: {1} softly held her hand over the old wound of {0}. {0} 's old wound has been closed.
LanguageData.MSG_FoxianHealingFailedBecauseOfTrait: {1} tried to cure the old wound of {0}. However, she saw {0} 's happy face and hesitated to treat.
LanguageData.MSG_PetiteServantDragonWantToTellYouSome: {0} seems to want to tell you something.
LanguageData.txt_StopPartyImmediately_Desc: [Cancel party right now] \n"Do you guys forget something else must to do?" \ n\n The settlers who get involved in the party by throwing out urgent work. If you feel sick of them, please use this button. (The party ends immediately in exchange for a temporary mood debuff to the participants.)
LanguageData.txt_DoNotShowUntilNextUpdate: [Do not show until next mod update]
LanguageData.LFSetting_JoinLimitGlobalDesc: It is applied only at the time of the first load. (It is possible to setting each data later.)
LanguageData.LFSetting_AchievementAlert_JoinLimitGlob: *** data loaded with this setting will have the achievement of joining limit permanently disabled! ***
LanguageData.LFSetting_JoinLimitLocalDesc: Upper limit setting for each save data (high-priority than global setting).
LanguageData.LFSetting_AchievementAlert_JoinLimitLoca: *** joining limit achievement of this data will be permanently disabled! ***
LanguageData.LFSetting_DisallowPostBondRelation: Prevent acquired bond events in animals
LanguageData.LFSetting_LuminousEqRefuelThresh: Threshold of starting refuel for lanterns
LanguageData.LFSetting_UpdateSpringWaterRegularly: - Update spring water regularly（performance impact : Low)
LanguageData.LFSetting_RenderBodyInHotSpringJoy: - Render pawn body while hot spring bathing（performance impact : VeryLow)
LanguageData.LFSetting_RenderSpringWaterSurface: - Render water surfaces of the hot springs（performance impact : Low)
LanguageData.LFSetting_RenderSpringWaterEdge: - (imperfect) Render water edges of the hot springs（performance impact : Low - Mid)
LanguageData.LFSetting_RenderHotSpringVapor: - Render Vapor of the hot springs（performance impact : Low)
LanguageData.LFSetting_UseColdSpringForChilling: - Allow cold spring relaxing for recreation（performance impact : VeryLow)
LanguageData.LFSetting_EnableUpdateNotice: - Display mod updates at game start
